outputs.output_descr:
•	Guidelines on labeling for air conditioner and refrigerator (energy efficient standards,  testing procedures,  labeling application forms) 
•	Design of energy efficient database structure and developed guidelines for experts to develop a software for the database, experts started development of a demo version. Completed a transfer of database on public lighting 
•	Organize educational workshops and training course on energy efficiency for local manufacturers and other stakeholders on standards and new policy/regulation on  labeling.

project_descr: Barrier Removal to  the Cost- Effective Development and Implementation of Energy Efficiency Standards and Labelling Project (BRESL)
